channel.title: Data Factory on Marczak.IO
channel.description: Adam Marczak blog created for purpose of personal contribution and sharing knowledge to communities everywhere.

item.title: Azure Data Factory versus Logic Apps for Analysis Services Refresh
item.description: Data factory is currently go-to service for data load and transformation processes in Azure. In this article a common scenario of refreshing models in Azure Analysis Services will be implemented using ADF components including a comparison with the same process using Azure Logic Apps.
